flash_on

Inspiration

ThirdWorldTech was born out a desire to use cultural background to unify communities as opposed to tearing them apart. It is absurd to see people discriminate one another for their shared culture rather than celebrate such a unique part of their identity. As this toxic mentality spreads, the fear that cultural heritage will continue to be shunned and one day lost becomes more of an inevitable reality. With ThirdWorldTech, we hope to instill a love for culture among the youth of our community.

computer

Technology for Education

Technologyâ€™s impact on education is multitudinous. A device and internet access are enough to bring the vast expanse of knowledge at our fingertips. As first-world high school students, we understand the privileges that come with technology in our education system. We recognize that the educational potential of our fellow students in developing countries is hindered by lack of technology. Our goal is to close this gap in education, one laptop at a time.

flare

Our Mission

ThirdWorldTech is a network of high school students across the Bay Area who strive to accomplish cultural unity while creating educational opportunities for the less fortunate. We host community-level events that celebrate cultural differences and similarities. Any profits and donations will be used to enhance technology in the educational environment of developing countries. ThirdWorldTech aspires to use technology as a token of gratitude to cultural origins.
